rows.label: tlk0001027_msg0001
rows.name:
Rex!
It's time to eat, drink, and be merry!

rows.label: tlk0001027_msg0002
rows.name:
It'll be a while yet until we reach
our destination.

rows.label: tlk0001027_msg0003
rows.name:
Get yourself rested and ready
to face the trials ahead. That's
the salvager way.

rows.label: tlk0001027_msg0004
rows.name:
I'd absolutely love to, but I sort of
got guard duty...

rows.label: tlk0001027_msg0005
rows.name:
Ah, that's too bad. Well, make sure
you guard like no one's ever guarded
before!

rows.label: tlk0001027_msg0006
rows.name:
Even mindless tasks like that are a part
of life's little lessons! Ha ha ha!
